page.title: 14Kilmaurs _ Village
page.content: The centre of the village is a Conservation Area and great care has been taken to ensure that all new building and renovation is in keeping with existing buildings in order to preserve the "Village" image. There are three private housing estates on the outskirts of the village to the North, West and South. Individual houses are being erected in small vacant lots in and around the village. Many of the larger mansion-type dwellings are of the Victorian era. The majority of the dwellings are council_owned, outnumbering the privately-owned by two to one, a situation which is changing rapidly, owing to many council tenants buying their homes. Every class in the School has planted a tree in a central site.
